mapper.update: update l_graindepot set graindepotid=graindepotid ,graindepotcode=#{graindepotcode} ,graindepotname=#{graindepotname} ,provinceid=#{provinceid} ,cityid=#{cityid} ,countyid=#{countyid} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,address=#{address} ,postalcode=#{postalcode} ,artificialperson=#{artificialperson} ,artificialidcard=#{artificialidcard} ,linkman=#{linkman} ,linkmanidcard=#{linkmanidcard} ,telnumber=#{telnumber} ,faxnumber=#{faxnumber} ,graindepoturl=#{graindepoturl} ,bankname=#{bankname} ,bankaccno=#{bankaccno} ,remark=#{remark} ,creditcode=#{creditcode} ,taxregno=#{taxregno} ,taxnature=#{taxnature} ,businessrep=#{businessrep} ,businessscope=#{businessscope} ,longitude=#{longitude} ,latitude=#{latitude} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} where graindepotid=#{graindepotid}

update l_graindepot set graindepotid=graindepotid ,graindepotcode=#{graindepotcode} ,graindepotname=#{graindepotname} ,provinceid=#{provinceid} ,cityid=#{cityid} ,countyid=#{countyid} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,address=#{address} ,postalcode=#{postalcode} ,artificialperson=#{artificialperson} ,artificialidcard=#{artificialidcard} ,linkman=#{linkman} ,linkmanidcard=#{linkmanidcard} ,telnumber=#{telnumber} ,faxnumber=#{faxnumber} ,graindepoturl=#{graindepoturl} ,bankname=#{bankname} ,bankaccno=#{bankaccno} ,remark=#{remark} ,creditcode=#{creditcode} ,taxregno=#{taxregno} ,taxnature=#{taxnature} ,businessrep=#{businessrep} ,businessscope=#{businessscope} ,longitude=#{longitude} ,latitude=#{latitude} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} where 1=1 and graindepotid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and graindepotid =#{Where_Id} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and graindepotcode=#{Where_graindepotcode} and graindepotname=#{Where_graindepotname} and provinceid=#{Where_provinceid} and cityid=#{Where_cityid} and countyid=#{Where_countyid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and address=#{Where_address} and postalcode=#{Where_postalcode} and artificialperson=#{Where_artificialperson} and artificialidcard=#{Where_artificialidcard} and linkman=#{Where_linkman} and linkmanidcard=#{Where_linkmanidcard} and telnumber=#{Where_telnumber} and faxnumber=#{Where_faxnumber} and graindepoturl=#{Where_graindepoturl} and bankname=#{Where_bankname} and bankaccno=#{Where_bankaccno} and remark=#{Where_remark} and creditcode=#{Where_creditcode} and taxregno=#{Where_taxregno} and taxnature=#{Where_taxnature} and businessrep=#{Where_businessrep} and businessscope=#{Where_businessscope} and longitude=#{Where_longitude} and latitude=#{Where_latitude} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime}
mapper.select: select t.graindepotid "graindepotid", t.graindepotcode "graindepotcode", t.graindepotname "graindepotname", t.provinceid "provinceid", t.cityid "cityid", t.countyid "countyid", t.groupid "groupid", t.companyid "companyid", t.address "address", t.postalcode "postalcode", t.artificialperson "artificialperson", t.artificialidcard "artificialidcard", t.linkman "linkman", t.linkmanidcard "linkmanidcard", t.telnumber "telnumber", t.faxnumber "faxnumber", t.graindepoturl "graindepoturl", t.bankname "bankname", t.bankaccno "bankaccno", t.remark "remark", t.creditcode "creditcode", t.taxregno "taxregno", t.taxnature "taxnature", t.businessrep "businessrep", t.businessscope "businessscope", t.longitude "longitude", t.latitude "latitude", t.createuserid "createuserid", t.createtime "createtime" from l_graindepot t where graindepotid=#{graindepotid}

select count(*) from l_graindepot t where 1=1 and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.graindepotid!=#{NoId} and t.graindepotcode=#{graindepotcode} and t.graindepotname=#{graindepotname} and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.address=#{address} and t.postalcode=#{postalcode} and t.artificialperson=#{artificialperson} and t.artificialidcard=#{artificialidcard} and t.linkman=#{linkman} and t.linkmanidcard=#{linkmanidcard} and t.telnumber=#{telnumber} and t.faxnumber=#{faxnumber} and t.graindepoturl=#{graindepoturl} and t.bankname=#{bankname} and t.bankaccno=#{bankaccno} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.creditcode=#{creditcode} and t.taxregno=#{taxregno} and t.taxnature=#{taxnature} and t.businessrep=#{businessrep} and t.businessscope=#{businessscope} and t.longitude=#{longitude} and t.latitude=#{latitude} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime}
SELECT COUNT(*) from l_graindepot where 1=1 and graindepotname=#{graindepotname} and graindepotid!=#{graindepotid} and companyid!=#{companyid}
